html: 1.8.21  12:45 am   bill what do you think about making a 2020 song

1.8.21  12:26 am   you've persuaded me to appreciate tuesdays more. they are, indeed, very fresh. tuesday is also just a nice word to say. scratches my phonetic itch.

are there any words that you find phonetically pleasing?

1.8.21  12:03 am   How are you?

1.7.21  8:10 pm   Sometimes when I try to do too much in too little time (with music) I get in a state of confusion. In that case I often finish the work, but seldom well. Though the feeling of confusion and overwhelmingness and complete loss of objectivity can be harsh. Ever feel the same?

      If so, do you have any tricks for not falling into that trap?

1.7.21  7:49 pm   why is your music so magical

     and are you planning to make more?

     the might quit song spooked me you might stop forever :(

1.7.21  12:52 pm   I feel like depression is setting upon me. Everyday since the lockdown, I have not seen my friends. My work schedule has gone from great to nil. Nowadays, I have been using my computer more often. My curiousity has diminished to nothing. I don't feel I am worth anything anymore. What is your tip for people like me?

      is that the secret sauce

1.6.21  9:01 pm   i feel like there is no objective truth. that has been good for me because it meant i saw no person as objectively evil, but it seems like some people have also figured out there is no objective truth, and they are exploiting that for their own selfish gains. where do we go from here?

      are we doomed to always live in the trenches of the information war?
1.6.21  8:49 pm   if you had infinite time, would you still spend as much of it as possible making music? Or are there some other hobbies that you would love to explore
1.6.21  8:47 pm   i play flute and guitar, but I find it hard to always stay motivated to practice, what do you do to stay motivated?

1.6.21  8:20 pm   hey bill, if you are reading this question, could you please tell me a story about why does some of your old songs sound so mellow?

     you know, like i'm crazy, stupid song (not THE stupid song), i love you (the old one), etc. i thought that you are known for your catchy, upbeat, happy-go-lucky, yet mysterious songs.

      i want you to come up with an answer to this as soon as possible, i will use it for an extra layer of research.

p.s. did i use capital letters while writing This (oh, f-)
1.6.21  7:52 pm   bill i need help. im so anxious and concerned about everything and i could use some reassurance from someone whom i admire. what words of wisdom can you offer?

1.6.21  6:41 pm   Did you have to practice your singing to get to the point you're at?

     Your voice sounds nice, you pull off relatively complicated melodies, and your vocal runs such as the one you did on the one "on" of the second half of the second chorus of "And the Day Goes On" are very well done
